home.bio: A Software Engineer focusing on Frontend development with over 2 years of experience. I have expertise in modern JavaScript ecosystems such as React, Next.js, and TypeScript for building responsive and high-performance web applications. With attention to detail and a deep understanding of user experience, I am committed to delivering digital solutions that are not only functional but also intuitive and enjoyable to use.
home.tech_stack_desc: Technologies I use to build modern and scalable applications
home.work_desc: I help brands, companies, institutions, and startups create exceptional digital experiences for their businesses through strategic development services.
home.work_cta: I'm open to freelance projects, please contact me via email to see how we can collaborate.

about.subtitle: A glimpse of who I am â€“ because every detail adds depth to the canvas of life.

intro.greeting: Hello! Thanks for checking out my personal website.
intro.bio1: I'm a Software Engineer who mainly works on the Frontend side of web development, and I've been doing this for more than two years. I specialize in modern JavaScript tools like React, Next.js, and TypeScript to build websites that are fast, responsive, and work well on all devices. I care a lot about how people experience a website, and I make sure the apps I build are not only useful but also easy and fun to use.
intro.bio2: My interest in web development started from a love for technology and design. I believe technology should help make life better, not harder. I follow this idea in every project I work on. I like learning new things and keeping up with the latest trends in web development.
intro.bio3: When I work on a project, I don't just focus on the code. I also think about the business goals and the user's needs. I want to create apps that solve real problems in a smart and efficient way. Before I start building anything, I make sure I understand what the users and the business really need.
intro.bio4: Besides coding, I enjoy learning about UI/UX design and software architecture. I think understanding these areas is important for making apps that are not only functional but also easy to maintain and improve over time. I'm also part of the open source community and like sharing what I know with other developers.
intro.bio5: I'm always looking for new opportunities and happy to work with others. If you have a cool project or want to talk about technology, feel free to reach out. Let's make something great together!
